# C3 Career Consultants - Career Counselling in Patiala

## About
C3 Career Consultants is the leading career counselling service in Patiala, Punjab, founded by Manik Raj Singla in 2002. We specialize in expert career counselling, psychometric assessments, stream selection, and competitive exam coaching.

## Founder
Manik Raj Singla - Expert career counsellor with 23+ years of experience in career counselling and guidance. MBA in Career Counselling from Punjabi University Patiala.

## Core Services

### Career Counselling
- Psychometric assessments and aptitude testing
- Stream selection guidance for 10th and 12th class students
- Course selection and career roadmap planning
- One-on-one personalized counselling sessions
- Vocational guidance and skill assessment
- College and university admission guidance

### Competitive Exam Coaching
- SSC Coaching: CGL, CHSL, MTS, GD Constable
- UPSC Coaching: Civil Services, CDS, NDA, CAPF
- Banking Exam Coaching: IBPS PO, Clerk, SBI, RBI
- CTET and Teacher Eligibility Tests
- Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) exams
- State PSC examinations

### Motivational Speaking
- Corporate training and leadership development
- Student motivation and personality development
- Communication skills and confidence building
- Workshop facilitation and seminars

## Key Statistics
- 23+ years of excellence in career counselling
- 50,000+ students successfully guided
- 95% success rate in career placement
- 1,000+ selections in competitive exams
- 15+ prestigious awards and recognitions

## Awards & Recognition
- Rotary Visionary Leadership Award 2024
- Zone 4 E-Directory Editor - Rotary International (12 Districts, 1,300 Clubs)

- Best Career Counsellor Award - Patiala
- Community Service Excellence Award

- Assistant Governor - Rotary International District 3090

- Career Counselling Expert - Punjab Education Board

- MBA in Career Counselling - Punjabi University Patiala

- Certified Career Counsellor
- Psychometric Assessment Specialist

## Mission
To empower individuals through expert career counselling and guidance, helping them discover their true potential and achieve their professional dreams.

## Vision
To be the most trusted career counselling service in Punjab, transforming 100,000+ lives through personalized guidance and proven strategies.

- Integrity in career counselling
- Personalized attention to each student
- Evidence-based guidance through psychometric tests
- Continuous support throughout career journey
- Affordable and accessible career counselling services
